name: NATIONAL RURAL DEV. COUNCIL
briefDescription: The Organization is working for development Handicrafts & Craftsman since 1995 in the Odisa State with the disadvantage section of artisan.The major Focus area are Up gradation of skill of artisans,Design development on potential crafts,Technology up-gradation on metal,textiles,terracotta,Bamboo craft&etc,Product diversification & convergence with one to another craft, research & development,Facilatate marketing & providing social security to artisans.
